Body: Possible Duplicate:  Samsung Kies: 'This version of the device can not be updated'. Never?  Have Galaxy SL (GT I9003). Had given mobile to Samsung service center for upgrade to Android 2.3, stupids installed Android 2.2 (Froyo) again. And now my Kies, give message that"This Firmware can not be updated". Is it because of wrong Kies version or the issue is with OS install itself?Any solutions to this?
Title: Kies: Firmware can not be upgraded?

history.Text: Have Galaxy SL (GT I9003). Had given mobile to Samsung service center for upgrade to Android 2.3, stupids installed Android 2.2 (Froyo) again. And now my Kies, give message that"This Firmware can not be updated". Is it because of wrong Kies version or the issue is with OS install itself?Any solutions to this?
